Package com.fromlabs.inventory.inventoryservice

Class IngredientController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fromlabs.inventory.inventoryservice.IngredientController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("/ingredient")
public class IngredientController
extends java.lang.Object
    IngredientController is REST controller which responsible for all C.R.U.D operations of IngredientEntity. InventoryEntity and ItemEntity.
    See Also:
    REST Controller example : Building REST services with Spring

      • syncInventory

        @PostMapping("inventory/sync")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> syncInventory​(@RequestHeader("tenantId")
                                                                java.lang.Long tenantId)
        Return a ResponseEntity object of boolean result after sync

        Sync means that the information (quantity) of the items which has the same ingredient will be summarized and create (if that figure is not exist) or update (if that figure is already exist).

        Parameters:
        tenantId - The client id (must be provided)
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity
        See Also:
        ResponseEntity, WebTemplateProcess

      • beforeSaveIngredientCheckConstraint

        private boolean beforeSaveIngredientCheckConstraint​(IngredientRequest request)
        Check ingredient is not exist before save . And, if it has parents, this parents must exist
        Parameters:
        request - IngredientRequest
        Returns:
        boolean
        See Also:

                                                   IngredientRequest request)

        IngredientRequest, Objects

      • beforeDeleteAllItemsCheckConstraint

        private boolean beforeDeleteAllItemsCheckConstraint​(ItemDeleteAllRequest request)
        Check constraint before delete multiple item. Firstly, Check the quantity of deleted is less or equal to remaining quantity. Check all deleted items are existed
        Parameters:
        request - ItemDeleteAllRequest
        Returns:
        boolean
        See Also:
        ItemDeleteAllRequest

      • afterDeleteAllItemsCheckConstraint

        private boolean afterDeleteAllItemsCheckConstraint()
        Check constraint after delete multiple item. Firstly, Check the quantity of remaining quantity is not negative. If quantity of a specific ingredient is low stock and , then, raise notification. Check all deleted items are not existed
        Returns:
        boolean

      • updateIngredientCheckConstraint

        private boolean updateIngredientCheckConstraint​(IngredientRequest request)
        Check ingredient must be existed before update. And, if it is an ingredient type, it must not have children. Finally, if it is an ingredient category, it must not have parents
        Parameters:
        request - IngredientRequest
        Returns:
        boolean
        See Also:
        Objects

      • saveItemCheckConstraint

        private boolean saveItemCheckConstraint​(ItemRequest request)
        Check item must not be existed before create (no duplicate code). Check item's ingredient exist. And, that ingredient must not be category. Finally, the expired date must be in the future.
        Parameters:
        request - ItemRequest
        Returns:
        boolean
        See Also:
        Objects, Instant

      • updateItemCheckConstraint

        private boolean updateItemCheckConstraint​(ItemRequest request)
        Check item must be existed before update. Check item hase duplicated code. Finally, the expired date must be in the future.
        Parameters:
        request - ItemRequest
        Returns:
        boolean
        See Also:
        Objects, Instant

      • validateIngredient

        private RequestValidator validateIngredient​(IngredientRequest request,
                                            java.lang.Boolean isUpdate)
        Return RequestValidator for the validation of all ingredient filter parameter and client ID and parent ID are non-negative number (based on it is an update request or not)
        Parameters:
        request - The request for creating or updating an ingredient
        isUpdate - The boolean flag for whether request is update (true) or create (false)
        Returns:
        RequestValidator
